GxExpressions

Class GxExpressionDateTimesFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • GxExpressions.GxExpressionAbstract
      • GxExpressions.GxExpressionDateTimesFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GxExpressionInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GxExpressionDatesFormatter, GxExpressionTimestampsFormatter

    public class GxExpressionDateTimesFormatter
extends GxExpressionAbstract
    The class defines a grid expression to format date/timestamps according to BBj supported masks
    Author:
    Hyyan Abo Fakher
